message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1750000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. It's a good price for a product that's worth $1500000 to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm still hoping for a little closer to my asking price.  How about we split the difference and go with $1675000? This is a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target as possible. I'm willing to go up to $1650000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
